title: Replace TV Service with Request a Service section and add education options to Job Apply

requirements.text: Replace the current 'Television Services' navigation option (in the sidebar, landing page card, and any related routing) with 'Request a Service'. The page title and all references should read 'Request a Service' throughout the app.

quotes: television service option replace to request a service

acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar nav item formerly labeled 'Television Services' now reads 'Request a Service'
Landing page navigation card formerly labeled 'Television Services' now reads 'Request a Service'
The services page heading reads 'Request a Service'
All internal references to the old label are updated

requirements.text: Update the service/work order categories on the 'Request a Service' page to include exactly these repair service types: Television Repair, AC Repair, Fridge Repair, Ceiling Fan Repair, and Table Fan Repair. These should be the selectable work detail/service type options available when a customer submits a service request.

quotes: work details is television repair, ac repair, fridge repair, ceiling fan and table fan repair

acceptanceCriteria: Service type/work detail dropdown or selection includes: Television Repair, AC Repair, Fridge Repair, Ceiling Fan Repair, Table Fan Repair
Previous service categories not in this list are removed or replaced
Backend data model/types for work order categories are updated to support these service types
A customer can successfully submit a service request selecting any of these five options

requirements.text: Add the following preferred education options to the worker Job Apply multi-step form's 'Preferred Education' field: Electronic Commerce Engineering, AC Mechanic, Electrical Engineering, ITI (Electrician Trade), Diploma in Refrigeration & Air Conditioning, and Diploma in Electronics & Communication. These should appear as selectable options alongside any existing education options.

quotes: job apply link preffered education option add to electronic commerce engineering ,ac mechanic ,and this work related education you suggetion to add

acceptanceCriteria: The preferred education field on the job apply form includes: Electronic Commerce Engineering, AC Mechanic, Electrical Engineering, ITI (Electrician Trade), Diploma in Refrigeration & Air Conditioning, Diploma in Electronics & Communication
All new education options are selectable in the multi-step job application form
Previously existing education options are preserved unless they conflict
The education field data is submitted correctly with the job application
